statements: SELECT * FROM quantum_sensors_locations;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, latitude, longitude FROM quantum_sensors_locations ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, latitude, longitude FROM quantum_sensors_locations WHERE deployment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensors_locations WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'Qubit%';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, deployment_date FROM quantum_sensors_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensors_locations WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, latitude, longitude FROM quantum_sensors_locations WHERE deployment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_name, latitude, longitude FROM quantum_sensors_locations WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'Q%';
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensors_locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40.0 AND 45.0 AND longitude BETWEEN -80.0 AND -75.0;
SELECT sensor_name, deployment_date FROM quantum_sensors_locations ORDER BY deployment_date DESC, sensor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM QuantumSensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location_name FROM QuantumSensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM QuantumSensors JOIN SensorReadings ON QuantumSensors.sensor_id = SensorReadings.sensor_id WHERE reading_value > 50;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM QuantumSensors WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'Q%';
SELECT * FROM SensorReadings ORDER BY reading_timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location_name FROM QuantumSensors WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -100.0;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM QuantumSensors WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT sensor_name, AVG(reading_value) AS average_reading FROM QuantumSensors JOIN SensorReadings ON QuantumSensors.sensor_id = SensorReadings.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name;

SELECT sensor_name, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM SensorReadings JOIN QuantumSensors ON SensorReadings.sensor_id = QuantumSensors.sensor_id WHERE reading_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM QuantumSensors WHERE location_name LIKE '%Laboratory%';
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM quantum_sensors ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location, deployed_at FROM quantum_sensors WHERE location = 'Lab A';
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_value > 50;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM sensor_locations WHERE region = 'North';
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM quantum_sensors WHERE location = 'Lab A';
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value, reading_time FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_value > 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sensors FROM quantum_sensors;
SELECT avg(reading_value) AS average_reading FROM sensor_readings;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM Sensors;
SELECT * FROM Deployments WHERE deployment_location = 'Room A';
SELECT deployment_id, deployment_date FROM Deployments ORDER BY deployment_date DESC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_role FROM Agents WHERE agent_role = 'Engineer';
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor';
SELECT sensor_name, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM Sensors WHERE location_latitude > 40 AND location_longitude < -80;
SELECT deployment_id, deployment_date, deployment_location, sensor_name FROM Deployments INNER JOIN Sensors ON Deployments.sensor_id = Sensors.sensor_id;
SELECT agent_name, agent_role, COUNT(*) AS total_deployments FROM Agents INNER JOIN Deployments ON Agents.agent_id = Deployments.sensor_id GROUP BY agent_name, agent_role;
SELECT * FROM SensorReadings WHERE reading_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location_name, deployment_date FROM quantum_sensors ORDER BY deployment_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, humidity, temperature FROM sensor_readings WHERE humidity > 80;
SELECT sensor_id, manufacturer, install_date FROM sensor_metadata WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT sensor_id, calibration_date, calibration_factor FROM sensor_calibration ORDER BY calibration_date;
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM quantum_sensors WHERE deployment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, reading_datetime, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY reading_datetime DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, calibration_date, calibration_factor FROM sensor_calibration WHERE calibration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, manufacturer, firmware_version FROM sensor_metadata WHERE firmware_version LIKE '%v2%';
